name: spicily
content:
spicily adverb
(FOOD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that tastes or smells of spices: The wine was a spicily aromatic blend of Chardonnay, Riesling and Muscat. Its flowers come in a variety of shades and it has spicily scented foliage.
in a way that is hot to the taste: I asked for the chef to prepare it extra spicily. The fish is fresh and spicily dressed with sweet, hot soy sauce.
More examplesFewer examplesWait for the flowers to open and waft spicily in spring and early summer.

spicily adverb
(EXCITING)
in a way that is exciting and interesting, especially because of being shocking or dealing with sexual matters: Local news stories must be written spicily in order to attract readers. The newspapers were full of his wife's spicily indiscreet quotes.
